question.qtitle: In Python, the ________ keyword is used to define a function.
The process of hiding the internal details of how an object works is known as ________.
In JavaScript, the ________ method is used to remove the last element from an array and return that element.
________ is a design pattern that restricts the instantiation of a class to a single instance.
The ________ keyword is used in SQL to retrieve data from a database.
